title: Strengthening Practical Teaching Method Competencies: Video-Based Monitoring to Enhance Collaborative Learning Teacher Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: In collaborative learning settings, students' cognitive, metacognitive, and collaborative behavioral indicators can be identified with 80% accuracy.
Video cases can be analyzed to classify student interaction patterns across three dimensions: collaboration, cognition, and metacognition.
Based on monitoring results, a three-stage feedback strategy can be developed to improve collaborative learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
